name: Maha Vailo of Apramanabha
text:
This card gains these effects based on the number of Equip Cards equipped to it.
? 1+: Gains 1000 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to it.
? 2+: Your opponent cannot activate monster effects during the Battle Phase.
? 3+: When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Card you control to the GY; negate that effect.
? 4+: Your opponent cannot activate card effects during the Battle Phase.
? 5+: Any battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent is doubled.
